Summary: Apparent airplane seen at night, over a city, takes a violent dip of approx. 100 feet in two seconds, then bounces back to original altitude.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were going to jack in the box around 7:00 pm. she was driving. out my passenger-side window, i saw what looked like a plane's lights. this was over a residential neighborhood about about 1\2 mile away. at first i saw a "root beer" colored light that was not bright but bigger than any star or planet. as soon as i started watching it, i saw it jerk to the right, turn to a dull white color and then disappear. a second later it appeared again as a red light, about the same size as when it was "root beer" colored. it was moving about the speed you would expect a plane to be moving. all of a sudden it took a dive like a roller coaster when it goes down that first steep plunge. i estimate that it plunged 100 feet. at the bottom it looped back and returned to it's initial altitude. the entire maneuver took two seconds or less. when i saw dive, it really got the adrenalin going. i knew innately that this was a much too radical maneuver for a plane. for one thing, it's against faa regulations for planes to be flying like that over a city. i lost sight of the object when we drove past some buildings.
